content: This is awful but let also not forget the Human Zoos whites constructed for Melanin Rich Human Beings. Those images are horrifying, that “Humans” could do that and take pleasure in it to other Human Beings… Like a canival, and when Melanin Rich people say, “Hey, stop killing us…” its like we just spit on someone for asking the Demonic “Humans” to stop killing us. If we said, “If you kill one more of us then we are going to…” Then it would be as if we just issued a terrorist threat to the Nation. But when a white kid runs into a CHURCH to kill Melanin Rich Humans, he is taken to Burger King!!! It is an understatement to say something just aint right. How do we solve this, WAR IN THE STREETS? Seems like whites didn’t stop brutalizing Melanin Rich People until we started BURNING CITIES!!!
